price: Itu adalah sebagian dan berita-berita negeri (yang telah dibinasakan) yang Kami ceritakan kepadamu (Muhammad); di antara negeri-negeri itu ada yang masih kedapatan bekas-bekasnya dan ada (pula) yang telah musnah.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيۡكَۖ مِنۡهَا قَآئِمٞ وَحَصِيدٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-qurā naquṣṣuhu ʿalayka min'hā qāimun waḥaṣīdun
